price: 28.Diggah isin cakki-le kabuk nee gutuqak net amaatuk sugteeniih, baatil net bilqisak sugten iyyen kattaate mari katayen marak.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
